narrative:
There has been no regulated activity performed at this location since the previous inspection. This was a focused
inspection of the IACUC documents located at Tufts Medical Center.
No non-compliant items were identified during this inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
*Note: Inspection was conducted 5/17-5/18. Exit interview conducted with IACUC personnel on 5/18.
